item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Welcome to obaseki blog!. This is my first post where I introduce myself and talk about what i would be writing about in this blog!

Basically starting this blog to write about technical topics that relates to my work to help me and also help you if you end up here.

Writing is the best way to connect your thoughts, makes you communnicate more effectively in this day and time.
